description:
Are you an experienced data science leader with a passion for innovative analytics solutions? Walmart is searching for a Senior Director of Data Science to join our team and help drive success through data-driven solutions.In this role, you will be responsible for developing and overseeing the data science strategy for Walmart’s global operations. You will collaborate across teams and departments to ensure data is utilized effectively to drive business decisions. We’re looking for a passionate leader who can bring together a team of data scientists to solve complex problems and take advantage of opportunities.To be successful in this role, you should have extensive experience in data science, machine learning, and related analytics technologies. You should also have a proven track record of leading teams and developing successful data-driven strategies. We want someone with a strong customer focus and a commitment to innovation.If you’re excited about leveraging data to drive innovation and success at one of the world’s largest companies, we want to hear from you!

Walmart is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
